name: Number Witch
description:
Second game created for Complete C# Unity Developer 2D - Learn to Code Making Games

The goal was basically to learn how to work with scenes. The game itself is a very simple "guess the number" one, in which you think of a number and the witch try to guess it. 

English is not my main language so there can be some typos.

Music: somber beauty by fwimmygoat
